title: Traditional Naturopathy
author: Robert Powell
description: Naturopathic medicine is based on the belief that the human body has an innate healing ability. Naturopathic doctors (NDs) teach their patients to use diet, exercise, lifestyle changes and cutting-edge, natural therapies to strengthen the immune system. They view the patient as a complex, interrelated system (a whole person), and craft comprehensive treatment plans that blend the best of modern, medical science and traditional, natural remedies to maintain approaches to maintain and restore health. We each have a unique physical, mental, emotional, genetic, environmental, social, and spiritual makeup. The Traditional Naturopath understands that all these factors affect our health.
